title: Клиника счастья. Реалити
overview: The first reality series based on KION. A unique clinic from the popular series opens its doors in real life. A team of experts - doctors, psychologists, sexologists - has only 3 days to save the families of the participants and strengthen their marriage. 24 couples from all over the country will try the most unexpected approaches and practices in order to better know themselves and their spouse through laughter and tears, restore the joy of love, and find their own formula of happiness. All that is required from the participants is maximum frankness, but are they ready to truly open up? Real people's stories are a real chance to change family relationships for the better.
